install.name: JoomBah Jobs Category
install.author: Faisel
install.description: This module categorizes the JoomBah Jobs based on Job Category, Location, Industry and Position.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: total_column
param.label: No. of columns
param.description: Number of columns to be displayed

param.name: total_row
param.label: No. of items per column
param.description: Number of items per column to be displayed

param.name: show_count
param.label: Show Count
param.description: Displays number of jobs in each categories

param.name: show_empty_count
param.label: Show Empty Count?
param.description: Show/Hide empty jobs in each categories
